title:
A Note on an Upper-Bound for the Sum of a Class K and an Extended Class
  K Function
abstract:
In this short note, we derive an upper-bound for the sum of two comparison
functions, namely for the sum of a class K and an extended class K function. To
the best of our knowledge, the relations derived in this note have not been
previously derived in the literature.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Systems and Control
